resources.string: Hide popups that contain certain phrases (case insensitive). Long-press the add button to use regular expression

If nothing shows up:
1-Disable the service. Depending on your phone, you might need to exclude this app from your 'cleaner' apps, since they stop the service after few minutes due to 'increased battery usage'.
2-Restart your device.
3-Clear cache.
4-Re-enable the service.
If this doesn't help, try clearing the data, although this will delete blacklist entries.
Please give this app the permission to read notifications
Starting from Android 6, user must grant the permission for apps to display pop-ups on top of other apps. Tap on \"enable\" to go to device settings
Popups can scroll if the text is too long; speed is configurable and can be set by using setScrollingPxPerSeconds(float) method
Leave a positive review on Google Play store, it helps a lot!
